org.hps.recon.ecal

Class CorrectGainRunDependenceDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.ecal.CorrectGainRunDependenceDriver

  • public class CorrectGainRunDependenceDriver
extends Driver
    This driver reads in a hit collection and outputs a new hit collection correcting for the run-dependent change in the energy. This change is: E(run) = E0 * (1+(run-run0)*k), where run0 is a reference run and k is a slope parameter, for each crystal This is primarily used for the 2019 run

      • slopeFileSlopes

        private Map<Integer,Double> slopeFileSlopes
        Read in a text file that has the slopes values. These correction factors can be multiplied directly onto the energy of the reconstructed hits and saved to a new list.
